statements: SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, policy_number FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY payment_id HAVING avg_payment > 500;
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_number = 1234 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT policy_holder_id, renewal_date, renewal_status FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT policy_holder_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE policy_holder_id = 123
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY renewal_date ASC
SELECT policy_holder_id, count(*) AS num_payments FROM premium_payments GROUP BY policy_holder_id HAVING num_payments > 3
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT policy_number, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, SUM(payment_amount) FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY policy_number HAVING SUM(payment_amount) > 5000;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT policyholder_name, COUNT(*) FROM Policyholders GROUP BY policyholder_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT PolicyHolderName, PolicyNumber FROM Policyholders WHERE PolicyHolderID = 12345;
SELECT AlertID, AlertType, AlertDate FROM Alerts WHERE AlertType = 'payment_due' ORDER BY AlertDate DESC;
SELECT PolicyNumber, RenewalDate, PremiumAmount FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE PolicyNumber IN ('POL001', 'POL002', 'POL003');
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE PaymentAmount > 1000 ORDER BY PaymentDate ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT policy_number, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY renewal_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE status = 'active' AND severity IN ('high', 'medium') ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_id FROM PremiumPayments JOIN Policyholders ON PremiumPayments.policy_holder_id = Policyholders.id ORDER BY PremiumPayments.approved_at ASC
SELECT * FROM Policyholders
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT policy_number, policy_type FROM PolicyDetails WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_date
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number FROM Policyholders WHERE policy_number = 1001;
SELECT alert_type, alert_date FROM Alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_type FROM Policyholders INNER JOIN PolicyDetails ON Policyholders.policy_number = PolicyDetails.policy_number;
SELECT policyholder_name, payment_amount FROM Policyholders INNER JOIN PremiumPayments ON Policyholders.policy_number = PremiumPayments.policy_number ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
